attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not wish to be force fed news. It is mostly not pertinent & irrelevant. Often conjecture, but always REPETITIVE which becomes torturous. Every Radio channel 48 times a day-INSANITY!!(plus the ads too-madness) It is basically a spin platform to facilitate subliminal indoctrination. NO NEWS IS GOOD NEWS.
